availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hendley W. Haden (Madison County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer. Madison County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary Ann Moore Haden in Madison County on February 11, 1858. Father of William R. Haden, John M. Haden, and Marcus Luther Haden. Farmer in Madison County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Western Subdivision #2, p. 28.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, District #78, p. 20.
